title: Insta360 GO 2 now packing 64GB storage in minuscule action camera
content:
Introduced in March, the tiny Insta260 GO 2 action camera is a self-contained wide-angle cam that packs a lot of features. With stabilization, 120fps slow motion, hyperlapse, and other now-common features, its the size that makes this camera standout. The original GO 2 came with 32GB of internal storage for $299.99. The new GO2 64GB

The post Insta360 GO 2 now packing 64GB storage in minuscule action camera appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
